sub_fields.label: Image Anchor
sub_fields.name: 5050_image_anchor
sub_fields.instructions: By default the image will be anchored center center but use this to alter it based on which part of the image you want featured.

sub_fields.label: Category
sub_fields.name: testimonial_carousel_category
sub_fields.instructions: By default the system will load 10 random testimonials, if you wish to limit this to a specific testimonial category please select it below.

sub_fields.label: Show Tripadvisor Logo
sub_fields.name: testimonial_tripadvisor
sub_fields.instructions: Will show a Tripadvisor logo linking to Floors Castle Tripadvisor page.

sub_fields.label: Gallery
sub_fields.name: image_gallery_gallery
sub_fields.instructions: Each image when clicked will open in a lightbox gallery.

sub_fields.label: Image 1
sub_fields.name: fancy_text_image_1
sub_fields.instructions: Top larger image. Portrait image works best.

sub_fields.label: Image 2
sub_fields.name: fancy_text_image_2
sub_fields.instructions: Bottom smaller image. Landscape image works best.

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: cta_background_image
sub_fields.instructions: Top larger image. Portrait image works best.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: page_links_title
sub_fields.instructions: If this is left blank then by default the name of the page will be used.

sub_fields.label: Button Text
sub_fields.name: page_links_button_text
sub_fields.instructions: By default "View Page" will be used.

sub_fields.label: Price
sub_fields.name: tickets_price
sub_fields.instructions: If not filled in will not be shown
